360°Air Intake and Compact Design: This mini air purifiers for bedroom adopts 360°air intake to purify every corner of the room in all directions. With it, you can use it flexibly and enjoy the fresh air closer to you.

Aromatherapy: You can add 2-3 drops of your favorite essential oil (not included) to the aroma pad on top of this air purifiers for bedroom to enjoy a fragrant and relaxing environment while purifying the air.

One-Button Control：A simple one-button operation can switch between three speeds and timer mode. Long press the button for three seconds to set a 4-hour timer for the air purifiers for bedroom. This portable air purifiers for bedroom is user friendly, effective and convenient.
Ideal Gift: MORENTO air purifiers are great for friends and family as Housewarming gifts, Birthday gifts, Valentine's Day gift, Christmas gift, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly smaller than I expected, works great, perfect for small rooms.
reviews.reviewText: I recently moved and wanted an air purifier for the guest room and this one works pretty well. The first thing I will say about this is that the air purifier is that it is fairly small size. It is great for smaller rooms but definitely nothing like living room size. This also worked great for my resin printing area when I need it. The air purifier does a good job and this really gave me peace of mind. I no longer have bad air or the smell from say my resin printer. I did use this as well in my kitchen once and it does a good job with removing most of the cooking smell which is great. For the most part, I do enjoy having this device in my house and the compact size makes it great for moving around as needed. This is a very good air purifier to have and it is very quiet on the first setting but it can be noticeable on max setting. It does have a very simple LED light system to show that the device is one. The LED light can be a bit bright but not distracting. I get around this by just turning the led light towards the wall. This smaller size air purifier will not take up too much amount of space. It does a great job with giving you less bad air in smaller areas. Obviously this is not something I would put in my living room. It really does a good job with getting rid of the smell in the house if you happen to be cooking. I would be cooking and I turn this on before I go to bed and it gets rid of the smell over night. The controls for the most part are very simple as it is just a button press to turn on. It has very few fan functions. The filter is fairly easy to change and clean out as needed. It does not run hot or anything. The sound on this is very hard to notice when on the lower setting. Even at the highest setting the fan noise just becomes white noise for me. One thing to note is that all the cables are inside the air filter when you first open this. You have to remove the plastic film around the filter anyways so you should find that when you try to find the power cable. Overall this air filter is a good product if you keep it maintained. That means that you need to change the filter and vacuum the fans every month. If you do not it is not being run at the optimum efficiency. The white plating is also prone to yellowing if you happen to leave this in the sun. Part of my filter is actually yellow because of the sun light hitting the corner. It is easy to setup and easy to use for the most part. It is not very loud so you do not have to worry about it being distracting. It is a very compact air purifier so great or small rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little bedroom purifier!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this air purifier for our bedroom during smoke season in central Washington state. We've been running it full time for the past two months, and it's made a noticeable difference for my boyfriend, who has acute COPD and emphysema. He said it's definitely helped make our bedroom a safe haven from the smoky weather. I think it's a little noisy, but it's a white noise, so very easy to fall asleep to. It works pretty well where it's locate and I would definitely recommend it for anyone who needs a budget purifier for a medium size room. Though we haven't had to replace the filter yet, installing the filter was a cinch through the bottom. Very easy to operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hepa filter air purifier
reviews.reviewText: Moderately priced , whisper quiet, good for bathroom or small bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, but don’t use it every day
reviews.reviewText: I like this product a lot. Only issue I had with it was the light was blinking red after four months of use. I had a similar fan do that to me and I had to throw it out. I took the filter out and cleaned it, and then put it back back in and held down the power button until it blinked pink instead of red. Then I held it down again and the white light returned and was pulsing and the fan running idle the whole time. After giving it a few minutes I put it on full blast and it is back to working. I use it every day which is probably not what the manufacturers planned on, so the red light incident might be because it’s already got a lot mileage. Use it intentionally, and if it blinks red while idling try what I did, hope it helps. Other than that, great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great air purifier
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to set up, use and keep my home clean. It was extremely easy to set up within 1 minute for both. I don't use oil for the sponge but it came scented which is light. Already notice the difference with the amount of dust, much lighter and air feels cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice for the price but the scents won't be distributed or anything, don't take it into consideration of buying it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Purifier at a Good Price
reviews.reviewText: The perfect size for my office. My space has little to no circulation since it is far from the HVAC system. I sought after a decent air purifier for a single room, on a budget. A fan and motor inside funneled air through a mesh grate, which got the job done, pulling the source of the smell out of the air and into the filter. The quietest mode works fine, and I can hardly hear it. Also, their customer service is responsive and kind. Highly recommend for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked for a few days: updated
reviews.reviewText: Worked great for a few days then it stopped working. Not sure if it even purified the air. You get what you pay for I guess.. waste of money. The place where you put essential oils drops is just a spice you put drops onto in a compartment with no ventilation except on top. I never even smelled the oils after placing them.Update: the seller contacted me and immediately sent a replacement that works just fine. Great quality and great for purifying the air.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sa matière de fabrication est très bonne et il est très beau physiquement.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Nous avons une maison qui n'a pas d'échangeur d'air et il est difficile de faire circuler l'air en hiver surtout quand on fait la cuisine.Je me suis procuré ce MORENTO pour remédier à ce problème. Je suis extrêmement ravie de la performance de ce purificateur d'air.Sa matière de fabrication est très bonne et il est très beau physiquement. Il a plusieurs modes de fonctionnement.Il est très silencieux comparer à d'autres modèles même quand la vitesse du ventilateur est au plus haut niveau (quand on fait la cuisine).Depuis que nous l'avons, il y a presque plus d'odeur de nourriture à la maison pourtant, je continue de cuisiner avec les fenêtres fermées.Son prix est abordable comparer aux modèles du même standard.Il s'agit d'un bon produit et je le recommande.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for my husband's home office -- definitely helps with the smell and the dust build-up
reviews.reviewText: My husband's home office (about 10 square meters) was always full of dust so quickly and often had a funky smell, so I ordered this air purifier in the hope that it would make it so I had to dust less often AND help with the smell. So far, it's working perfectly for both of those things! I can definitely tell a HUGE difference when I walk into his office now, if he's been running this for a while (even on low). He sometimes adds a few drops of lavender essential oil to the "oil pad" in there, which adds a very nice but very subtle scent -- not too strong. I am VERY happy that I ordered this little machine and am thinking about getting one for my son's room as well. I'm also a bit jealous because I have a much larger air purifier by a different brand in my office that doesn't allow me to add essential oils, and I wish it did. I think it would be nice to add eucalyptus oil when you have a bad cold, too.
Unfortunately it really dosent do anything in sleep mode but make noise. Air output is next to nothing.

Das Gerät ist super handlich, leise und macht was es soll. Es reinigt die Luft und man hat direkt ein anderes Gefühl beim Atmen. Der Punkt mit den Aromatropfen ist richtig cool - es riecht nicht zu arg und nicht zu wenig. Lautstärke des Geräts finde ich ok und somit hat der Hersteller alles gehalten was er verspricht.Sehr zu empfehlen.
Gutes Produkt mit der Möglichkeit, die Luftansaugleistung zu erhöhen
